QuestData.Title: The Ashtongue Tribe
QuestData.Description: The Ashtongue tribe is feared among all Broken. It consists of the most vicious and bloodthirsty individuals, handpicked by Akama himself. They are as fierce and ruthless as any naga, demon or blood elf in Illidan's army and they have been deployed in large numbers at the Ruins of Baa'ri, southwest of here. Go there and put a dent in their numbers before they get a chance to mount an attack on us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Vindicator Aluumen wants you to go to the Ruins of Baa'ri and slay 3 Ashtongue Handlers, 4 Ashtongue Warriors and 6 Ashtongue Shaman.$B$BCompleting quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you completed the task I requested of you, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: Glory to the naaru, $N. You've done the Light's bidding by defeating those who follow Illidan.
